text: Sore bakari ka fukkatsu no hi ni wa, kare-ra ni kutsujoku o atae, kare wa ose rareyou. `Anata ga tagawa reto doto ni hai shita mono wa doko ni iru no ka. Sorera ni tsuite, anata gata wa (shinjinbukai hitobito to) ronso shite itade wanai ka.' Chishiki o atae rarete ita mono wa iu. `Kyo wa, kutsujoku to kutsu ga fushin-sha no ue ni aru noda
